metadata.title: Canned vegetables by TM Ukrpole and TM Battalion Smaku
metadata.description: Creating the best vegetable preserves in Ukraine

hero.titleMob: Quality from the fields, preserved in every jar
hero.title: Quality from the heart of the fields, preserved in every jar
hero.description: We grow premium vegetables in the environmentally clean Zakarpattia region and preserve their qualities in every product

tomatoes.subtitle: Tomatoes
tomatoes.description: Juicy and flavorful tomatoes, harvested at the peak of ripeness, retain their natural sweetness and aroma. Perfect as a garnish or as a base for delicious sauces and salads.

cucumbers.subtitle: Cucumbers
cucumbers.description: Crisp and aromatic cucumbers, grown with care and preserved using traditional recipes. An ideal addition to your favorite dishes, maintaining the fresh taste of every season.

assorted.subtitle: Assorted
assorted.description: The perfect combination of crisp cucumbers and juicy tomatoes in one jar. Assorted preserves the best summer flavors, adding bright notes to your menu in any season.

peppers.subtitle: Peppers
peppers.description: Sweet and tender peppers, marinated for your delight. Their versatile taste perfectly complements any table, becoming a great choice for snacks or hot dishes.

quality.title: High product quality
quality.description: Our products are made exclusively from premium vegetables grown in controlled, eco-friendly conditions

production.title: Innovative production
production.description: We use modern technologies that preserve all the beneficial properties of vegetables during processing

trust.title: Trust and reliability
trust.description: We have established ourselves as a reliable partner thanks to consistent product quality and transparent collaboration terms

cooperation.title: Cooperation
cooperation.description: We work with trusted farmers who grow eco-friendly vegetables and have our own modern production facilities that ensure a full conservation cycle. We offer partnerships to promote our products or create goods under your private label

mission.title: Our mission
mission.description: To combine the best of nature and modern technologies, providing a taste you can trust. We produce high-quality products that retain the natural taste and benefits of vegetables.

experience.title: Over 15 years in the market
experience.description: Years of experience ensure stability, client trust, and product quality.

production.title: Own production
production.description: Control at every stage: from raw materials to the finished product. Certified by ISO 22000:2005.

farmers.title: Farming partners
farmers.description: Vegetables are grown in the eco-friendly Zakarpattia region by trusted partners.

clients.title: 30+ regular clients
clients.description: Our products meet partners' needs, ensuring long-term and successful cooperation.

naturalness.title: Naturalness
naturalness.description: We preserve natural taste and benefits without compromise.

innovations.title: Innovations
innovations.description: We apply modern technologies for the best results.

ecology.title: Ecological responsibility
ecology.description: We care for the environment at every stage of production.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: We build open and reliable relationships with clients.

productsPage.title: Products
productsPage.description: We grow eco-friendly vegetables, produce canned goods at a modern facility, offer partnerships to create products under your private label, and also release products under the brands:

cooperationPage.title: Cooperation and partnership
cooperationPage.description: Start partnering with us today! We will consider all nuances and offer favorable terms for your business. Click 'Start Cooperation' – together we will achieve success!

description.partOne: We specialize in producing products under your private label, ensuring quality and compliance with your requirements. Our successful brands and years of experience help create products trusted by consumers. Our processes are ISO 22000:2005 certified, and raw materials come from verified farms in the Zakarpattia region.
description.partTwo: We ensure a full production cycle – from cultivation to the finished product. Our partners include 'Tavrija', 'Rukavychka', 'Klas', 'Posad', and others. With us, you get a reliable partner and products that guarantee the success of your brand.

description.partOne: We are looking for reliable distributors to cooperate and develop our products in new markets. If you are ready to provide effective logistics, marketing, and interaction with leading retail chains, we are happy to offer you high-quality products already trusted by consumers.
description.partTwo: Cooperation with us is an opportunity to work with a brand that values quality, trust, and stability. We are open to discussing terms to create a mutually beneficial promotion strategy, ensuring success and customer satisfaction. If you are interested in partnership, contact us to discuss cooperation details and conditions!

contactsPage.title: Let's work together
contactsPage.description: Contact us through the provided information or fill out the feedback form, and we will prepare the most favorable conditions for cooperation!

address.title: Address
address.description: Zakarpattia region, Uzhhorod district, Chaslivtsi village, Heiivska Street, 2

policyPage.title: Privacy policy
policyPage.description: This Privacy policy (hereinafter referred to as 'Policy') regulates the collection, use, storage, and protection of users' personal data on the site (hereinafter referred to as 'Site'), as well as the programs and products of the Site. We strive to ensure maximum confidentiality and security of your data, adhering to all applicable laws and regulations governing personal data protection.

section1.title: 1. Collection of personal data
section1.part1: 1.1. The seller may collect various types of personal data, including but not limited to: name, surname, email address, phone number, physical address, payment information, account data, and other information that may be required to provide our services.
section1.part2: 1.2. Data may be collected by filling out forms on our site, during registration, order placement, subscription to newsletters, participation in promotions, and other interactions with our Site.

section2.title: 2. Cookies
section2.part1: 2.1. Cookies are small text files stored on your device when visiting our site. They allow us to recognize your browser and remember certain information.
section2.part2: 2.2. We use cookies to improve the functionality of our site, analyze traffic, provide personalized content and advertising, and save your preferences and login data.
section2.part3: 2.3. Cookies are used to provide users with the most relevant information on our Site; help make it safer, more secure, and user-friendly; allow monitoring of Policy violations by users or their devices; enable evaluating the number and frequency of requests, and identifying and blocking users or devices attempting mass data downloads from the site.
section2.part4: 2.4. You can set your browser to block cookies or notify you about their use. However, blocking cookies may lead to limited site functionality. We recommend keeping cookies enabled to use all features and functions of our Site.

section3.title: 3. Use of personal data
section3.part1: 3.1. The seller uses collected data to provide proper service, process orders, improve our service, communicate with customers, conduct marketing and advertising campaigns, and fulfill other obligations arising during our operations.
section3.part2: 3.2. The seller does not transfer customers' personal data to third parties without explicit consent, except as required by law or when necessary for providing Site services.

section4.title: 4. Protection of personal data
section4.part1: 4.1. The Seller employs modern methods of data protection, including encryption, firewalls, and secure servers, to ensure the safety of your personal data.
section4.part2: 4.2. The Seller guarantees the confidentiality and protection of Buyers' personal data.
section4.part3: 4.3. The Seller undertakes to protect data from unauthorized access by third parties, not to distribute or transfer data to third parties (except for transferring data to commercial partners, persons authorized by the Seller to directly process data for the specified purposes, including mobile operators, postal or courier services, contact centers, advertising agencies, as well as upon request by competent government authorities in accordance with the law).

section5.title: 5. User rights
section5.part1: 5.1. You have the right to know what data we collect and to request access to your personal data at any time.
section5.part2: 5.2. You have the right to modify or delete your personal data. To do so, you can contact our support service.

section6.title: 6. Changes to the policy
section6.part1: We reserve the right to modify this Policy at any time. All changes will be published on this page, and, where possible, we will notify you via email.

section7.title: 7. Contact information
section7.part1: If you have any questions or comments regarding this Policy, please contact us using the contact information provided on our website.

notFoundPage.title: Oops, it seems this page has been preserved!
notFoundPage.description: Unfortunately, this page does not exist — check the address or use the navigation to search.

callBack.title: Callback
callBack.description: Leave your number, and we will call you back promptly.

successful.title: Your request has been successfully sent!
successful.description: Our managers are already processing your inquiry and will contact you shortly.

unsuccessful.title: Request submission failed!
unsuccessful.description: Unfortunately, something went wrong. Please try to send your request again or call us.
